sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section style="width: 100vw !important; height: 100vh !important; overflow: hidden !important;"
  >
    <v-skeleton-loader
      v-if="!isLoading"
      type="image"
    />
      <the-content
        ref="theContent"
        @onDataLoaded="isLoading=true"
        v-show="isLoading"
        :page-name="'index'"
        style="width: 100vw !important; height: 100vh !important;overflow: hidden !important;"
      >
        <router-view />
      </the-content>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import TheContent from "../../components/content/TheContent.vue";
export default {
  name: "AuthLayout",
  data: () =>({
    backgroundImage: null,
    isLoading : false
  }),
  components: {
    TheContent,
  },
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
